summary: Standalone follower based on the preset "Amy V2" With the Emfy Cleric Armor
descriptionHtml:
[center]This is a standalone follower ! My first !
Based on the preset [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78810/?]Amy V2[/url][/center]


[center] [img]https://img4.hostingpics.net/pics/398877Elza.jpg[/img][/center]


[center]Name : Elza
Start level : 10
Marriage : Yes
Spells : Oakflesh, Stoneflesh
Perk : 1H, 2H, Block, Heavy armor
She is better if you found a War axe for her!
Location : Riverwood Sleeping Giant Inn

CREDITS

Preset : [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78810/?]Amy V2 By Jindo2003[/url] Thank for the permission !
Armor : [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61013/]Emfy Cleric Robes[/url] By [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3373573]nsk13[/url], [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47376/?]Tiwa44[/url], [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42280/?]BloodFree[/url], [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11005/?]volvaga0[/url], [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18008/?]SydneyB[/url],
 [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13348/?]Gullbergh[/url], [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39128/?]Halendia[/url], [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27064/?]harokyang[/url],[i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56758/?]arison_c[/url], [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25259/?]ChronoTrigger77[/url], [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24444/?]Petrovich[/url], [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14294/?]anano
[/url][/i][/i][/i][/i][/i][/i][/i][/i][/i][/i][/i]Boots : [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55611/?]Gim Boots by Gimora[/url][/center][center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE[/url][/center][center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The eyes of beauty[/url] by LogRaam
